mapper.select: SELECT a.MenuID, a.DomainID, a.IsAdmin, a.MenuType, a.BizSection, a.ParentObjectID, a.ParentObjectType, a.ServiceDevice, a.DisplayName, a.MultiDisplayName, a.IconClass, IFNULL(a.MemberOf,0) AS MemberOf, a.MenuPath, a.LinkMenuID, a.SecurityLevel, a.SortKey, a.SiteMapPosition, a.SortPath, a.HasFolder, a.IsInherited, a.IsUse, a.IsDisplay, case when a.OriginMenuID IS not null AND a.OriginMenuID>0 then b.URL ELSE a.URL end URL, case when a.OriginMenuID IS not null AND a.OriginMenuID>0 then b.MobileURL ELSE a.MobileURL end MobileURL, case when a.OriginMenuID IS not null AND a.OriginMenuID>0 then b.Reserved5 ELSE a.Reserved5 end Reserved5, a.Target, a.MobileTarget, a.Description, a.Reserved1, a.Reserved2, a.Reserved3, a.Reserved4 , a.OriginMenuID, a.IsCopy , Fn_GetBaseCodeName(0, 'MenuType', a.MenuType) AS MenuTypeName, Fn_GetBaseCodeName(0, 'BizSection', a.BizSection) AS BizSectionName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu b ON a.OriginMenuID = b.MenuID AND b.DomainID = 0 WHERE a.MenuID = #{menuID}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu ( DomainID, IsAdmin, MenuType, BizSection, ParentObjectID, ParentObjectType, ServiceDevice, DisplayName, MultiDisplayName, IconClass, MemberOf, MenuPath, SecurityLevel, SortKey, SortPath, IsUse, IsCopy, IsDisplay, URL, MobileURL, Target, MobileTarget, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate, SiteMapPosition, Reserved1, Reserved2, Reserved3, Reserved4, Reserved5, IsInherited ) VALUES ( #{domainID}, #{isAdmin}, #{menuType}, #{bizSection}, #{parentObjectID}, #{parentObjectType}, #{serviceDevice}, #{displayName}, #{multiDisplayName}, #{iconClass}, #{memberOf}, (SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(MenuPath.MenuPath, ''), #{memberOf}, ';') FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu AS MenuPath WHERE MenuPath.MenuID = #{memberOf}), #{securityLevel}, #{sortKey}, #{sortPath}, #{isUse}, #{isCopy}, #{isDisplay}, #{url}, #{mobileURL}, #{target}, #{mobileTarget}, #{description}, #{registerCode}, NOW(3), #{siteMapPosition}, #{reserved1}, #{reserved2}, #{reserved3}, #{reserved4}, #{reserved5}, #{isInherited} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu SET SortKey=#{sortKey}, MemberOf=#{memberOf}, SortPath=#{sortPath}, ModifierCode=#{modID}, ModifyDate=NOW(3) WHERE MenuID = #{menuID}
mapper.select: SELECT MenuID, DisplayName, SortPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu A WHERE FIND_IN_SET(MenuID, (SELECT CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(Level SEPARATOR ',')) FROM (SELECT @Ids := (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(MenuID SEPARATOR ',') FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET(MemberOf, @Ids) ) Level FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu JOIN (SELECT @Ids := #{menuId}) temp1 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(MemberOf, @Ids) ) temp2 ) ) ORDER BY a.SortPath

SELECT A.MenuID, A.SortKey, A.SortPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu A, (SELECT MenuID, MemberOf, SortKey, IsAdmin, DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu WHERE MenuID = #{menuId}) B WHERE A.IsAdmin = B.IsAdmin AND A.DomainID = B.DomainID AND A.MemberOf = B.MemberOf AND A.SortKey > B.SortKey

update.foreach:

ParentObjectID = #{item.parentObjectId},
MemberOf = #{item.memberOf},
DomainID = #{item.domainId},
IsAdmin = #{item.isAdmin},

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu ( DomainID , IsAdmin , MenuType , BizSection , ParentObjectID , ParentObjectType , ServiceDevice , DisplayName , MultiDisplayName , IconClass , MemberOf , MenuPath , LinkMenuID , SecurityLevel , SortKey , SortPath , SiteMapPosition , HasFolder , IsInherited , IsUse , IsDisplay , URL , MobileURL , Target , MobileTarget , Description , RegisterCode , RegistDate , ModifierCode , ModifyDate , DeleteDate , Reserved1 , Reserved2 , Reserved3 , Reserved4 , Reserved5 , OriginMenuID , IsCopy ) SELECT #{item.domainID} AS DomainID , a.IsAdmin , a.MenuType , a.BizSection , 1 , a.ParentObjectType , a.ServiceDevice , a.DisplayName , a.MultiDisplayName , a.IconClass , IFNULL(myTop.Menuid ,0) , a.MenuPath , a.LinkMenuID , a.SecurityLevel , #{item.sortKey} , #{item.sortPath} , a.SiteMapPosition , a.HasFolder , a.IsInherited , a.IsUse , a.IsDisplay , a.URL , a.MobileURL , a.Target , a.MobileTarget , a.Description , #{userCode} AS RegisterCode , NOW(3) AS RegistDate , #{userCode} AS ModifierCode , NOW(3) AS ModifyDate , a.DeleteDate , a.Reserved1 , a.Reserved2 , a.Reserved3 , a.Reserved4 , a.Reserved5 , a.MenuID AS OriginMenuID , a.IsCopy FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu myTop ON myTop.OriginMenuID = a.MemberOf AND myTop.DomainID=#{item.domainID} LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu B ON b.Menuid = myTop.Menuid AND B.DomainID=myTop.DomainID WHERE a.DomainID = 0 AND a.MenuID = #{item.menuId}
